author: Xbox
description:
The CUBE is an MMO RPG shooter. A giant, levitating Cube with rotating rows and edges. Hidden within is an unknown equation capable of altering the laws of reality. Can you survive another turn?

WISHLIST NOW.
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/the-cube/9NQSML5RHP9F

The game combines unique world-building, an intriguing narrative, constant progression and exciting quests. It features a dynamic world full of memorable characters, diverse biomes, and tons of enemies, including powerful bosses. Set in the Atomic Universe, the story unfolds on the brink of a new threat. The mysterious Cube has become the epicenter of increasingly dangerous phenomena, and in order to save humanity, players must plunge deep into its secrets—and survive.
But beware, the Cube can flip everything in an instant—as the world shifts, so do you.

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

title: The CUBE - Announcement Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
On this episode of The Official Xbox Podcast, we sit down with the one and only Phil Spencer at the Fallout 76 booth at Summer Game Fest Play Days. He shares his experiences playing on the ROG Xbox Ally X, working with the different development teams, which games really stood out to him during the Xbox Games Showcase, his trips to Japan, Xbox Play Anywhere, and more!

00:00 Introduction
01:00 Xbox in 2025
04:16 Studios Working Together
05:42 Year of Obsidian
06:50 Clockwork Revolution
09:19 Keeper
10:40 ESO, Sea of Thieves, Age of Mythology, and Fallout 76
12:18 Xbox and Japanese Developers
15:12 SUmmer Game Fest Play Days
18:06 Xbox Play Anywhere
19:59 ROG Xbox Ally
23:46 25 Years of Xbox
24:54 Closing

Listen to us on Spotify/Apple Podcasts 🎧 
https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/officialxboxpodcast

title: Phil Spencer Xbox Games Showcase Interview | The Official Xbox Podcast

author: Xbox
description:
Every question must have its answer! Embark on the luxury cruise of Agatha Christie - Death on the Nile, departing for Xbox Series X|S on September 2025.

Death on the Nile is an adventure-detective game, offering a fresh twist on Agatha Christie’s famous story. Set in the lively 1970s, play as Hercule Poirot and detective Jane Royce as they solve two connected mysteries. Dive into a journey filled with intrigue, deception, and unexpected revelations.

author: Xbox
description:
Atomic Heart 2 is an action-adventure role-playing game that brings you back to a retrofuturistic universe, full of new characters and dangers. The sequel features a living world rich with possibilities and places a heavy emphasis on story, role-playing elements, and player freedom. The story unfolds in an alternate-history world, with events now expanding to a global scale.
Return to the magnificent world of science and technology, and find out what the next chapter has in store for you – WISHLIST NOW!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/atomic-heart-2/9N1GF8P9KDPR

author: Xbox
description:
Play your way. Grab your gear, grab your friends. Deploy the garden gnome and the piggy bank. It's time to clean house. 

FBC: Firebreak is a 3-player cooperative first-person shooter set within the enigmatic Federal Bureau of Control (FBC). As the Bureau’s headquarters faces a deadly and prolonged siege by otherworldly forces, only Firebreak—its most adaptable response unit—has the skills and courage to restore order.   

FBC: Firebreak is scheduled to release on June 17th for PC and Xbox Series X|S. Wishlist now!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/fbc-firebreak/9pdcn8z4hkrn
